[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/help](./help.md) &gt; [HelpBubble](./help.helpbubble.md)

## HelpBubble class

Model representing a scrollable help bubble. Displays a styled title and a list of key binding entries in a scrollable viewport.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class HelpBubble 
```
